DOC.brief_summary: This open label , non-comparative investigation determine tolerance Eczema Repair Emollient healthy subject dry/atopic dry/atopic skin . The Eczema Repair Emollient apply 47 hour occlusion . Skin tolerance assess immediately 1 hour , 24 , 48 72 hour patch removal .
DOC.brief_title: A 47 Hour Occlusive Cutaneous Skin Patch Test Adult Subjects With Dry/Atopic Skin
DOC.detailed_description: At immediate , 1 , 24 , 48 , 72 hour post-test patch removal ( date & time assessment record ) , test site score erythema oedema train investigator use ISO 10993 score system . Primary Endpoint The irritation test product accord Cutaneous Irritancy Index value . The test product grade 'non-irritant ' confirm study dermatologist .
DOC.criteria: Subjects able give write informed consent write informed consent obtain Generally healthy male female subject age 18 65 year inclusive Subjects assess dermatologist dry/atopic dry/ atopic skin Subjects able understand study , cooperate study procedure able attend study assessment Subjects active Psoriasis active skin disorder present skin tumour malignant disease history Subjects take antihistamine corticoid , medication treatment diabetes mellitus , immunosuppressive drug medication opinion dermatologist may affect test result . Subjects active skin disorder history skin disorder ( e.g . psoriasis , eczema , vitiligo , pityriasis versicolor , acne ) opinion trainee dermatologist SIT personnel may affect test result
